bike.description: Monocoque carbon frame, E2 integrated headset, BB90 integrated bottom bracket, hidden fender mounts

components.description: Bontrager carbon FCC, carbon E2 1-1/8" - 1.5" steerer, wide stance carbon legs, accepts 25mm hub endcaps w/integrated SpeedTrap computer mount
Bontrager Race X Lite FCC, wider and taller flanges, 25mm endcaps, outboard J-bend spokes
Bontrager inForm Race X Lite, hollow titanium rails, 146mm width
Bontrager Race XXX Lite Carbon, 27.2mm, 20mm offset
Cane Creek IS-8 for E2 Integrated
